1: <pb/>Ayic mantalaj jun yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic, aytaxon ec' jun Slolonel Dios sb'i. A jun chi' aytaxon ec' yed' Dios, Dios ton val.
2: Ayic manto sb'o jun yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic Dios, aytaxon ec' yed'oc.
3: A' yac'lab'ejnac Dios chi' ayic sb'oannac masanil tastac. Malaj junoc tas b'onac tato man̈ yujoc.
4: A Slolonel Dios chi', aj q'uinal. Yuj jun q'uinal chi' ay saquilq'uinal d'ayon̈ anima on̈ tic.
5: A jun saquilq'uinal chi' tz'ac'an saquilq'uinal b'aj ay q'uic'alq'uinal. Axo jun q'uic'alq'uinal chi', max yal-laj yac'an tup jun saquilq'uinal chi'.
6: <pb/>Ay jun vin̈ checb'ilcot yuj Dios scuchan Juan.
7: Ulnaquec' vin̈ yac' testigoal sb'a yuj jun saquilq'uinal chi', yic vach' masanil mach tz'ac'anoch jun saquilq'uinal chi' d'a sc'ool.
8: Man̈oclaj vin̈aj Juan chi' aj saquilq'uinal, ton̈ej ul yac'nac testigoal sb'a vin̈ yuuj.
9: A jun yel saquilq'uinal chi', van sjavi d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic. A' tz'ac'an saquilq'uinal d'a masanil eb' anima.
10: <pb/>A jun Slolonel Dios sb'i chi', ulnaquec' d'a tic. A b'ojinac yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic. Palta ayic ix uleq'ui, maj nachajel-laj yuj eb' anima tato a'.
11: A d'a juntzan̈ eb' yico', ata' ulnac eq'ui, palta maj chajoclaj yuj eb' yic chi'.
12: Palta a jantacn̈ej eb' schaani, jantacn̈ej eb' tz'ac'anoch d'a sc'ool, a tz'alani to ay yalan yic eb' yoch yuninaloc Dios.
13: Ayic tz'och eb' yuninaloc Dios, ichato tz'aljixi eb'. Palta man̈ lajanoc icha tz'aj yalji eb' anima. Man̈ animaoc ay sgana tz'alji eb'. Man̈ yujoc sgana junoc vinac, palta a Dios tz'ac'anoch eb' yuninaloc.
14: <pb/>A jun Slolonel Dios sb'i chi', ochnac snivanil icha quico'. Ulnaquec' cajan d'a co cal. A jun chi' te yel. Nivan svach'c'olal Dios ul sch'oxnac d'ayon̈. Quilnac val snivanil yelc'ochi, yujto an̈ej val jun chi' Yuninal Dios, cotnac d'a Smam.
15: A vin̈aj Juan aljinaccan yab'ixal jun chi' icha tic: <pb/>—Ay jun tzac'an sja vuuj, palta ec'alto val yelc'och yopisio d'a vichan̈, yujto ayic manto in alji, aytaxon eq'ui. Valnacxo yab'ixal d'ayex, xchi vin̈.
16: <pb/>A jun chi', tz'acan yaj svach'c'olal, yuj chi' tz'acan sch'ox svach'c'olal chi' d'ayon̈.
17: A vin̈aj Moisés ac'jinaccan sley Dios d'ayon̈. Axo Jesucristo sch'oxan svach'c'olal Dios d'ayon̈, syac'an jun sc'ayb'ub'al te yel.
18: Malaj junoc mach ix ilan Dios juneloc. Palta a jun pitan̈ Yuninal, Dios ton paxi, a ul ch'oxjinaqueli. A jun Yuninal tic junn̈ejtaxon yaj yed' Smam chi'.
19: <pb/>A junel, ay juntzan̈ eb' israel aj Jerusalén, ix schecb'at jayvan̈ eb' sacerdote eb' yed' jayvan̈ eb' yin̈tilal Leví. A d'a vin̈aj Juan ix c'och eb'. Ix sc'anb'an eb' d'a vin̈: <pb/>—¿Mach ach? xchi eb'.
20: <pb/>Ix yalan sjichanil vin̈aj Juan chi' d'a eb': <pb/>—A in tic, man̈oc in Cristo in, xchi vin̈ d'a eb'.
21: <pb/>Ix sc'anb'an pax eb' d'a vin̈: <pb/>—¿Mach ach jun? ¿Mato a ach Elías ach? xchi eb'. <pb/>—Man̈oc in laj, xchi vin̈. <pb/>—¿Mato a ach tic schecab' ach Dios tan̈vab'il cuuj? xchi eb'. <pb/>—Maay, xchi vin̈.
22: <pb/>Ix sc'anb'anxi eb' d'a vin̈: <pb/>—¿Mach ach pax jun? Al d'ayon̈ mach ach, yujto yovalil ol b'at calxi yab' eb' on̈ checancoti. Al d'ayon̈ tas aji, xchi eb'.
23: <pb/>Yuj chi', ix yalan vin̈ d'a eb': <pb/>—A in tic tzin avaj d'a tz'inan luum, svalan icha tic: Icha tz'aj sb'o b'e ayic sjavi junoc yajal, icha chi' tzeyutej e b'oan e b'eyb'al, yujto ol ja vin̈ Cajal, xin chi. Yujto icha chi' yajcan stz'ib'aj vab'ixal yuj vin̈aj Isaías schecab' Dios d'a peca', xchi vin̈ d'a eb'.
24: <pb/>A juntzan̈ eb' xid'nac ec' d'a vin̈aj Juan chi', aton eb' vin̈ fariseo checannacb'at eb'.
25: Ix sc'anb'an pax eb' d'a vin̈: <pb/>—¿Tas yuj tzac' bautizar eb' anima tato man̈ ach Cristooc, tato man̈ ach Elíasoc, tato man̈oc ach schecab' Dios tan̈vab'il cuuj? xchi eb' d'a vin̈.
26: <pb/>—A in tic svac' bautizar eb' anima d'a a a'. Palta ay jun ayxoec' d'a co cal tic manto eyojtacoc.
27: A jun chi', tzac'an sja vuuj, ec'al yopisio d'a vichan̈. Man̈ in mojoc vac'an servil, vach'chom ton̈ej tzin tijel sch'an̈al xan̈ab' d'a yoc, xchi vin̈aj Juan chi' d'a eb'.
28: <pb/>A d'a sc'axepal a' Jordán, d'a jun lugar scuch Betania, ata' ix ac'ji bautizar eb' anima yuj vin̈aj Juan chi'. Ata' pax ix b'at sc'anb'ej juntzan̈ tic eb' d'a vin̈.
29: <pb/>Axo d'a junxo c'u, ix yilanb'at vin̈aj Juan to van sc'och Jesús, ix yalan vin̈: <pb/>—Inai, a yopisio jun van sja tic, icha yopisio noc' calnel, icha chi' yaj yopisio yuj Dios, yujto a' ix javi yic'canel co mul co masanil d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic.
30: Aton jun tic valnac: Ay jun tzac'an sja vuuj, palta ec'al yopisio d'ayin, yujto ayic manto in alji, aytaxon eq'ui, xin chi.
31: Max nachajel vuuj mach jun chi', palta in ja vac' bautizar eb' anima d'a a a', yic vach' ol nachajel yuj eb' quetisraelal mach jun chi', xchi vin̈aj Juan chi'.
32: <pb/>Ix yalanpax vin̈: <pb/>—Ix vil yemul Yespíritu Dios d'a satchaan̈ d'a yib'an̈ icha junoc noc' paramuch, ix em d'a yib'an̈, ix ochcan d'ay.
33: Max nachajel vuuj, mach jun chi'. Palta a jun checjinac in cot vac' bautizar eb' anima d'a a a', a' ix alan d'ayin: Ol il yemul Vespíritu d'a yib'an̈ junoc mach, ol ochcan d'ay. A jun chi' ol ac'anoch Espíritu Santo d'a eb' anima, ichato ol ac'joc bautizar eb' yuuj, xchi Dios d'ayin.
34: A in tic ix vil jun chi'. Yuj chi' svac' testigoal in b'a yuuj to a Jesús tic, Yuninal ton Dios, xchi vin̈.
35: <pb/>Axo d'a junxo c'u, ayec' vin̈aj Juan yed' chavan̈ eb' vin̈ sc'ayb'um.
36: Axo ix yilanb'at vin̈, van yec' Jesús ta'. Yuj chi' ix yal vin̈: <pb/>—Inai, a jun tz'ec' chi', icha yopisio junoc noc' calnel, icha chi' yopisio yuj Dios, xchi vin̈.
37: <pb/>Ayic ix yab'an jun chi' eb' vin̈ sc'ayb'um vin̈aj Juan chi', ix och tzac'an eb' vin̈ yuj Jesús.
38: Axo ix meltzajb'at q'uelan Jesús chi' d'a spatic. Ix yilani, tzac'anoch eb' vin̈ yuuj. <pb/>—¿Tas tze saya'? xchi d'a eb' vin̈. <pb/>—Ach co C'ayb'umal ¿b'ajtil ay a posado? xchi eb' vin̈ d'ay.
39: <pb/>—Cotan̈ec, b'at quilecnab'i b'aj ay in posado chi', xchi d'a eb' vin̈. <pb/>Ix b'at eb' vin̈ yed'oc, ix b'at yilan eb' vin̈ b'aj ayeq'ui. Vanxo yem c'u ix b'at eb' vin̈, yuj chi' q'uic'b'alxo ix jax eb' vin̈.
40: <pb/>Ix yab' chavan̈ eb' vin̈ chi' tas ix yal vin̈aj Juan chi', yuj chi' ix och tzac'an eb' vin̈ yuj Jesús. Ay jun vin̈ scuch Andrés, yuc'tac sb'a vin̈ yed' vin̈aj Simón Pedro.
41: Ix lajvi slolon vin̈aj Andrés chi' yed' Jesús chi', ix b'at sayan vin̈ yuc'tac vin̈ chi'. Axo ix chax vin̈ yuj vin̈, ix yalan vin̈: <pb/>—Ix ilchaj vin̈ Mesías cuuj, xchi vin̈. (Mesías syalelc'ochi, Cristo, Ac'b'il Yopisio).
42: <pb/>Junanto rato chi', ix yic'anb'at vin̈ yuc'tac vin̈ chi' d'a Jesús. Ix och q'uelan Jesús d'a vin̈aj Simón, ix yalan d'a vin̈: <pb/>—Simón, yuninal ach vin̈aj Juan. Cefas ol a b'iejcani, xchi d'a vin̈. (Cefas syalelc'ochi, Pedro, ma a q'uen q'ueen.)
43: <pb/>Axo d'a junxo c'u, ix snaan Jesús sb'at d'a yol yic Galilea. Ix ilchaj vin̈aj Felipe yuuj. <pb/>—Ochan̈ in c'ayb'umoc, xchi d'a vin̈.
44: <pb/>A vin̈aj Felipe chi', aj chon̈ab' Betsaida vin̈, aton schon̈ab' vin̈aj Andrés yed' vin̈aj Pedro.
45: Axo vin̈aj Felipe chi' xid' sayancot vin̈aj Natanael. Axo ix ilchaj vin̈ yuj vin̈, ix yalan vin̈: <pb/>—Ay jun ix ilchaj cuuj. Aton jun chi' tz'ib'ab'ilcan yab'ixal yuj vin̈aj Moisés d'a ley, tz'ib'ab'ilpaxcan yuj eb' schecab' Dios d'a peca', aton Jesús, yuninal vin̈aj José aj chon̈ab' Nazaret, xchi vin̈.
46: <pb/>Ix yalan vin̈aj Natanael chi': <pb/>—¿Tom ay junoc tas vach' syal scot d'a Nazaret chi'? xchi vin̈. <pb/>—Cotan̈, b'at quilnab'i, xchi vin̈aj Felipe chi'.
47: <pb/>Axo ix yilan Jesús to van sc'och vin̈aj Natanael chi', ix yalani: <pb/>—A jun vin̈ sjavi tic, yel ton val israel vin̈ d'a yichan̈ Dios, malaj b'aj chab' sat syutej sb'a vin̈, xchi Jesús.
48: <pb/>Yuj chi' ix sc'anb'an vin̈aj Natanael chi' d'ay: <pb/>—¿Tas ix utej in ojtacaneli? xchi vin̈. <pb/>—Ayic manto ach yavtejcot vin̈aj Felipe tic, toxo ix ach vila'. Ayach ec' d'a yich jun te' higo, xchi Jesús d'a vin̈.
49: <pb/>—Ach in C'ayb'umal, yel Yuninal ach Dios. Co Reyal ach a on̈ israel on̈ tic, xchi vin̈ d'ay.
50: <pb/>—¿Yujn̈ejto ix vala': Ix ach vil d'a yich jun te' higo, yuj chi' tzin ac'och d'a a c'ool? Palta ayto juntzan̈xo ch'oxnab'il satub'tac ol ila', te nivan yelc'ochi, xchi d'a vin̈.
51: <pb/>Ix yalanxi Jesús d'a eb' ayec' chi' yed'oc: <pb/>—Val yel sval d'ayex, ol eyila' to jacan spuertail satchaan̈. Axo eb' yángel Dios ol eyil sq'ue eb' yed' yemxul eb' d'ayin a in Ac'b'il in cot yuj Dios voch animail tic, xchi Jesús.
